Title: Relates to a feasibility study and report on the potential reestablishment of the empire state summer games
Summary: Directs the commissioner of parks, recreation and historic preservation, in conjunction with the department of economic development, to conduct a feasibility study and report on the potential reestablishment of the empire state summer games.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to a feasibility study and report on the potential reestablishment of the empire state summer games
